name: ExportOptionsSaveForWeb
shortdesc: Options for exporting Save For Web files.

property.name: format
property.shortdesc: The file format to use. Save For Web supports only Compuserve GIF, JPEG, PNG-8, PNG-24, and BMP formats.

property.name: PNG8
property.shortdesc: If true, uses 8 bits. If false, uses 24 bits. Valid only when 'format' = PNG.

property.name: colors
property.shortdesc: The number of colors in the palette.

property.name: ditherAmount
property.shortdesc: The amount of dither. Valid only when 'dither' = diffusion.

property.name: transparency
property.shortdesc: If true, transparent areas of the image are included in the saved image.

property.name: transparencyAmount
property.shortdesc: The amount of transparency dither. Valid only when 'transparency' = true.

property.name: interlaced
property.shortdesc: If true, the image downloads in multiple passes, progressive.

property.name: matteColor
property.shortdesc: The colors to blend transparent pixels against.

property.name: webSnap
property.shortdesc: The tolerance amount within which to snap close colors to web palette colors.

property.name: optimized
property.shortdesc: If true, creates smaller but less compatible files.

property.name: quality
property.shortdesc: The quality of the produced image (as a percentage). Range: 0 to 100.

property.name: includeProfile
property.shortdesc: If true, includes the document's embedded profile.

property.name: blur
property.shortdesc: The amount of blur to apply to the image to reduce artifacts.
